com.github.privacystreams.commons.statistic

Class StatisticOperators

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.privacystreams.commons.statistic.StatisticOperators

  • @PSOperatorWrapper
public class StatisticOperators
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to access statistic-related functions

      • range

        public static Function<java.util.List<Item>,java.lang.Double> range(java.lang.String numField)
        Calculate the range of the number values of a field in the stream. The field values must be in Number type, such as Integer, Double, Long, ... If calculation fails (e.g. there is no item in the stream), the result will be null.
        Parameters:
        numField - the name of the field, the field value must be a number.
        Returns:
        the function

      • sum

        public static Function<java.util.List<Item>,java.lang.Double> sum(java.lang.String numField)
        Calculate the sum of the number values of a field in the stream. The field values must be in Number type, such as Integer, Double, Long, ... If there is no valid field value in the stream, the "sum" result will be 0.0
        Parameters:
        numField - the name of the field, the field value must be a number.
        Returns:
        the function
